ModMetadata.Name: Cardboard Box Revamp
ModMetadata.Author: icywinterdawn
ModMetadata.Description: WARNING: This mod will not work, unless you install Stationeers.Addon mod loader. Read how to install it here: https://github.com/Erdroy/Stationeers.Addons --- The cardboard is already present in the game - this mod only unlocks the recipe for cardboard boxes in the autholath. Furthermore, the cardboard box no longer vanishes when the last item is removed.
